title: Conversion between type A interface{} and type B interface{} yields internal error
body:
by **joeyadams3.14159**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main

type A interface{}
type B interface{}

func main() {
	var a A
	var b B
	a = b
	b = a
}

2. What is the full compiler output?

type-errors.go:9: internal compiler error: syslook: can't find runtime.convE2E

Please file a bug report including a short program that triggers the error.
http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/entry?template=compilerbug

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

8g version release.2011-03-07 7666
